citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The semi-annual report to the Institutional Official dated 1/11/24 included a facility deficiency categorized as “minor” but
there was no correction schedule assigned.
Per this Section, one of the functions of the IACUC is to prepare reports of the Committee’s semi-annual evaluations of
the program for animal use and its inspection of the facilities. The report must contain a reasonable and specific plan and
schedule with dates for correcting each deficiency. This reporting process ensures that the Institutional Official is kept
informed and provided with accurate information on the status of the research facilities. Correct from this date 1/16/25
forward for all future semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official that include deficiencies identified by the IACUC.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The semi-annual report to the Institutional Official dated 1/11/24 included a facility deficiency categorized as “minor” but 
there was no correction schedule assigned. 
 
Per this Section, one of the functions of the IACUC is to prepare reports of the Committee’s semi-annual evaluations of 
the program for animal use and its inspection of the facilities. The report must contain a reasonable and specific plan and 
schedule with dates for correcting each deficiency. This reporting process ensures that the Institutional Official is kept 
informed and provided with accurate information on the status of the research facilities. Correct from this date 1/16/25 
forward for all future semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official that include deficiencies identified by the IACUC. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
